snippet: “John Adams Unbound,” a traveling exhibition at the Sachem Public Library in Holbrook, celebrates the founding father’s collection of 3,500 volumes and offers a glimpse at his sometimes irate annotations.
abstract: Visitors to Sachem Public Library in Holbrook, NY, can peruse book collection of American founding father John Adams at exhibition titled John Adams Unbound (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: “John Adams Unbound,” a traveling exhibition at the Sachem Public Library in Holbrook, celebrates the founding father’s collection of 3,500 volumes and offers a glimpse at his sometimes irate annotations.

headline.seo: In a Long Island Library, an Exhibition on John Adams’s Books
headline.main: At Times, the History Is in the Margins
headline.print_headline: At Times, the History Is in the Margins
